content: Three segment income before income taxes, which represents our core businesses, was JPY31.2 billion, an increase of 69% as investment management, investment gain loss improved. Thank you very much. And my question is, in the midterm, you say asset management, you want to grow your business and you have the -- you wanted net inflow, and you want to have the more sticky businesses, or in the origination and structured finance, you still haven't achieved results yet, but you expect them to become revenue drivers in the future. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much.
